title: Hunting for Beautiful Men, a Journey Through Time - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient Times   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Perverted Protagonist   Polyandry   Reverse Harem   Shameless Protagonist   Time Travel
author: stein
description: Having just finished suffering through school life, I didn’t expect to be electrocuted back in time. When other people leap through time they have a bunch of useful things with them, but all I have is a box of “Joan of Arc” brand artificial hymen. >
